meanings.definition: Provide with a staff of workers or assistants.
meanings.sent1: The new restaurant was fully staffed with friendly servers.
meanings.sent2: The hospital always makes sure to be properly staffed during busy times.
meanings.sent3: The zoo was so well staffed that even the animals had helpers!
meanings.sent4: The ship was staffed with a crew of experienced sailors ready to set sail.
meanings.sent5: The school play was staffed with talented actors who brought the characters to life.

meanings.definition: Furnished with a staff or staffs.
meanings.sent1: The grand hotel was elegantly staffed with polished wooden staffs.
meanings.sent2: The antique desk was beautifully staffed with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The garden party had a whimsically staffed gazebo made of colorful staffs.
meanings.sent4: The royal palace was staffed with golden staffs fit for a king.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a collection of historically staffed artifacts.
